body:
Comment 7: 
The good news is that running TestPseudoRandomSend on its own crashes it in a few
seconds.

GOGC=0 GOGCTRACE=1 GOMAXPROCS=2 ./runtime.test -test.short
-test.cpu=1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4,1,2,4
-test.v -test.run=TestPseudoRandomSend
